me.title: Hello world!
me.l1: My name is Alan, I'm a systems engineer from Bolivia. I've been programming for as long as I can remember. Actually i'm spending my time on the world of linux with arch.
me.l2: Beyond that, I'm really interested in AI development, and you can often catch me spending time on it.
